page.title: 05Farm Size/Buildings
page.content:
{Farms}in the Kinross area range from about 42ha-230ha.Very large farms often own other smaller farms. Gallowhill(1003) is a relatively small farm owning only 43ha.The larger farms usually have a greater variety of crops than the smaller farms,which often only consist of one crop and some beef cattle or sheep.
Several farms in this area are now {building}new sheds to either extend the farm or to replace old buildings. Many of these old buildings are being demolished to make way for larger store sheds for implements or crops, which could also be used to house cattle in the winter.
